Package model

Class Division

java.lang.Object
model.Division
public class Division extends Object
Division Class is developed to manage division data imported from the division table in the client_schedule database. Setters are not defined because all item changes and additions are intended to be managed in the database not the objects.

    • getDivisionIdByName

      public static int getDivisionIdByName(String searchName)
      Retries the division id based on a passed in division name. Lambda Expression: I used a lambda expression here to improve the readability of my for loop reducing potential bugs in the code. This expression is also more concise meaning there is slightly less code required to perform the same function which will make my code easier to maintain.
      Parameters:
      searchName - Division name to search for
      Returns:
      Returns a division id as an integer based on a passed in division name

    • getDivisionNameById

      public static String getDivisionNameById(int searchId)
      Retries the division name based on a passed in division id. Lambda Expression: I used a lambda expression here to improve the readability of my for loop reducing potential bugs in the code. This expression is also more concise meaning there is slightly less code required to perform the same function which will make my code easier to maintain.
      Parameters:
      searchId - Division id to search for
      Returns:
      Returns a division name as a string based on a passed in division id

    • getAllDivisionNamesByCountry

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllDivisionNamesByCountry(int country)
      Gets an ObservableList of all division names based on a passed in country id Lambda Expression: I used a lambda expression here to improve the readability of my for loop reducing potential bugs in the code. This expression is also more concise meaning there is slightly less code required to perform the same function which will make my code easier to maintain.
      Parameters:
      country - Country id to search for
      Returns:
      Returns an ObservableList of all division name strings based on a passed in country id

    • getCountryIdByDivisionId

      public static int getCountryIdByDivisionId(int searchId)
      Retries the country id based on a passed in division id. Lambda Expression: I used a lambda expression here to improve the readability of my for loop reducing potential bugs in the code. This expression is also more concise meaning there is slightly less code required to perform the same function which will make my code easier to maintain.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getDatabaseDivisions

      public static void getDatabaseDivisions()
      Pulls a query of all division items in the divisions table from the client_schedule database then creates division objects for those items. Produces an error prompt if unable to retrieve data from the database.
